column4: what mplayer command shall i use to extract a 356kbps mp3 file  from an .mp4 video ?
you can use mplayer to dump to WAV (then encode the WAV) with "mplayer -vo null -ao pcm foo"
if you compiling outside software, then check with that software if logs are created (i've never seen a compile log before, but they might be possible)
don't expect a huge reply.  compiling outside drivers is OT in #ubuntu, does realtek have a support channel?  (PS don't reply to me, i won't see it)
